title.rendered: “Honoring Dolev Yehud: IDF Confirms Recovery of Fallen Medic from Kibbutz Nir Oz”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has located the body of Dolev Yehud, of blessed memory.

The body of Dolev Yehud, of blessed memory, was located in Kibbutz Nir Oz after an intensive investigation by the Itan Unit in collaboration with anthropologists and following scientific identification.

Dolev Yehud, of blessed memory, a member of Kibbutz Nir Oz, served as a medic in United Hatzalah and Magen David Adom. During the terrorist attack, he left his home to assist and save lives.
Dolev was murdered by the Hamas terrorist organization on October 7, the 22nd of Tishrei 5784, and his body was found in Kibbutz Nir Oz.

After identification was carried out by medical personnel at the National Institute of Forensic Medicine and the Tzvi Institute, IDF representatives conveyed the message to the family.
The IDF shares in the family’s sorrow during this difficult time.

Attached is a photo of Dolev Yehud, of blessed memory: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC0306202423764182734531245124
